thread.title: Arsenal want Ronald Koeman to be Arsene Wenger’s successor and will challenge Barcelona to hire Everton boss
thread.title_full: Arsenal want Ronald Koeman to be Arsene Wenger’s successor and will challenge Barcelona to hire Everton boss

author: arichardson
title: Arsenal want Ronald Koeman to be Arsene Wenger’s successor and will challenge Barcelona to hire Everton boss
text:
RONALD KOEMAN is Arsenal chiefs’ preferred option to succeed Arsene Wenger, according to reports. 
The Dutchman has proved himself in the qualities the Gunners hierarchy are looking for. Getty Images 8 Ronald Koeman could have choice of Arsenal or Barcelona in the summer 
He overachieved on a small budget at Southampton and financed his purchases with big-money sales and has improved Everton , buying smartly since replacing Roberto Martinez in the summer. 
Arsenal are likely to face competition for Koeman from the Barcelona . 
Luis Enrique has confirmed he will vacate the Nou Camp hotseat in the summer. 
And former Barcelona hero, Koeman, is among the favourites to succeed him. Reuters Ronald Koeman has impressed in the Premier League with Southampton and Everton PA:Press Association Eddie Howe is one of the candidates on shortlist to replace Arsene Wenger Getty Images 8 Arsene Wenger is expected to finally stand down as Arsenal boss in the summer 
The Toffees gaffer is an icon in Catalonia after the scoring the goal which clinched their first-ever European Cup in 1992. 
But The Mirror report Arsenal want Koeman if, as expected, Wenger stands down in the summer. 
Max Allegri, Diego Simeone and Eddie Howe are among the other candidates touted to step into the Frenchman’s shoes. Getty Images
